heading: HR02588
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT, DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE THROUGH ITS BUREAU OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT FINANCE, COMMISSION ON AUDIT AND THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN TO CONDUCT A FACT-FINDING INVESTIGATION INTO THE SUDDEN CASH ADVANCE WORTH MILLIONS OF PESOS DONE BY THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT OF MASBATE DAYS LEADING TO MAY 2019 ELECTIONS AND THE SAID AGENCIES TO INITIATE APPROPRIATE ACTIONS AGAINST ERRING GOVERNMENT OFFICERS
status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2019-06-03

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02588
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT, DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE THROUGH ITS BUREAU OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT FINANCE, COMMISSION ON AUDIT AND THE OFFICE OF THE OMBUDSMAN TO CONDUCT A FACT-FINDING INVESTIGATION INTO THE SUDDEN CASH ADVANCE WORTH MILLIONS OF PESOS DONE BY THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT OF MASBATE DAYS LEADING TO MAY 2019 ELECTIONS AND THE SAID AGENCIES TO INITIATE APPROPRIATE ACTIONS AGAINST ERRING GOVERNMENT OFFICERS
